title: Preparing for Sarah. Parts 1 and 2
brief_description: Three mothers are followed from the time their pregnancies are confirmed to the day they meet with their husbands and babies in the park. The first part of the film deals with aspects of ante-natal care. The second part shows the actual birth and after care.
